item.description:
Do you crave Indie World Fusion Music as much as I do?
Here's the band for us! ESTHEMA is celebrating the release of their new CD!!

Fri 2/26 4 Bands!!! Esthema (9). Bearquarium (10); The Deck Hands (11); Mudfoot (12)
7:30 pm First, WELCOME NEW MEMBERS! Come to enjoy cocktails and meet new people as we welcome back existing members and introduce NEW MEMBERS to "FUN With Alcohol" @ Tavern on the Square, next door to the Cantab Lounge.

9:00 pm ESTHEMA, a WORLD FUSION ENSEMBLE out of Boston, MA (USA) creates their unique sound by fusing elements from the traditional music of the Eastern European Balkan region and the Near & Middle East with Progressive Rock and various styles of Jazz. The five musicians that shape the sound of ESTHEMA bring together both Western and Eastern influences, instruments, and musical concepts.


FOUR BANDS FOR $8.00 COVER!!!HInT: GET THERE BEFORE 9PM
EVERYONE MUST MAINTAIN THEIR OWN TAB!!

Take the RED line to the Central Square stop.

http://www.esthema.co...
http://www.myspace.co...
http://www.facebook.c...[url=http://www.esthema.com/music.html][/url]
item.name: World Fusion Ensemble: "ESTHEMA" at CANTAB (Central Square)
